actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Cobaltate(1-), bis[3-[[1-(3- chlorophenyl)-4,5-dihydro-3- methyl-5-(oxo-.kappa.O)-1H- pyrazol-4-yl]azo-.kappa.N1]-4-. (hydroxy-.kappa.O)- benzenesulfonamid- ato(2-)]-, sodium.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Cobaltate(1-), bis[3-[[1-(3- chlorophenyl)-4,5-dihydro-3- methyl-5-(oxo-.kappa.O)-1H- pyrazol-4-yl]azo-.kappa.N1]-4-. (hydroxy-.kappa.O)- benzenesulfonamid- ato(2-)]-, sodium.

To suspend temporarily the duty on Cobaltate(1-), bis[3-[[1-(3- chlorophenyl)-4,5-dihydro-3- methyl-5-(oxo-.kappa.O)-1H- pyrazol-4-yl]azo-.kappa.N1]-4-. (hydroxy-.kappa.O)- benzenesulfonamid- ato(2-)]-, sodium.
